name: Firsttryongithub
body:
### Welcome to FeedHedgehog's GithubPage.
This is the first time for me to use markdown with github on line.It is very simple to use.If you’re using GitHub Desktop, simply sync your repository and you’ll see the new branch.

### The purpose of the project
To be honest,i find it so hard to learn or do things without any purposes, as the verb saying "there is no purposes,there is no progress".hahaha,That is my word,and it started to make sense when I learned to mark things with pens.

### How to use the markdown 
As far as I know,it's really very easy to use.I think you will be like it once you make the first demo with it.
The first thing is that you must have your own github counts which can work well with the markdown,you can find the right way to start your first step[here](https://github.com/).With the help of the word and paragraphs on the main page,you should creat your first repository on github.After that you can click the setting button,and follow the tips ,and recode the code,and change the layouts of the web,and finally push the publish button,Congratulations,and you got your own website.  

### Authors and Contributors
Here I must @mention the names which are the authors to make contributions to the project.  In 2016, FeedHedghog(@author), Jason kiscy (@english name), and 刘璐 (@Chinese name) founded this page.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out this[Google](https://google.com) or [contact support](https://huntjobs.cn/) and I’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
